reviewText: I can't wait to get this DVD!! I've seen the entire sitcom through cable TV, and simply love it, you get into a point that you feel that the entire cast is part of your family. The actors are so sweet! Sadly, Providence is no longer on air, but with the release of this DVD I can keep a copy of those wonderful times watching a great sitcom----OK, I just got the DVD, and it's wonderful, that's all I can say.. Loved the last disc where the some of the cast and crew talked about the show.. it was sooo nice!!Also the bloopers section.. lovely! too bad it wasn't long enough, Good choice on the episoides as well.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Despite its flaws I genuinely like this series. It's a sort of classy, well-written, stylish forerunner to Gilmore Girls, even though the series seemingly have little in common beyond their production values and intelligence. I wish Providence's complete season by season release would hurry out onto DVD. As it is, these highlights have to do for now and they're nice to see.
summary: One Of Those Shows I Feel Silly For Liking But Like It I Do
Title: N/A

reviewText: Our family always enjoyed the series, Providence.  This selection features the highest rated and most popular episodes of the series.

reviewText: Was purchased as a Christmas gift. One of my wife's favorite series when it aired.

reviewText: This is a great DVD box set but what's wrong with NBC? Do they not think this show is good enough to warrant  ALL complete seasons on DVD?Does anyone have the word on whether they plan to release all the episodes or not? It would be ridiculous if they didn't. I think this show had a strong following and I think they should consider the fans.
summary: When are we going to get all the Seasons on DVD?
Title: N/A
